Articles.Content:
Hi guys.

In the server console i get the following error: " a established connection was aborted by the software in your host machine."

I have a DMP server up and running, wich I can connect to just fine. The problem appears when my friend attempts to connect. He get's an error reading: "A connection attempt failed because the connected party did not properly respond after a period of time, or established connection failed because connected host has failed to respond." 

In the server console i get the following error: " a established connection was aborted by the software in your host machine."

 

 

I have checked canyouseeme.org and it tells me my port forwarding is workinng as intended,

 

Any clues?
